name: "A Blessing From 'M'"
title: "A Blessing From 'M'"
desc: "Go forth and witness this world, my child... Make sure to be nice to everyone...\nYou'll meet good friends one day, I'm sure of it... That is my wish for your future."

skills.desc: Select a summon on your side to discard, convert its Usage(s) into up to 2 basic Elemental Dice of different types. If its usage count is no less than 3, then heal the most damaged character on your side for 2 HP.
